pageContext.title: FISHBONE – Live in Bordeaux
pageContext.content:
Live in Bordeaux is a special 25th anniversary release that’s delivered in a double 12-inch picture disc vinyl set.

Fishbone’s legacy as one of the best live bands in rock n’ roll history is undeniable; their influence on some of the biggest bands in contemporary music such as No Doubt, Sublime, Jane’s Addiction & the Red Hot Chili Peppers is a well-documented fact. Through 25 groundbreaking years of music history, this the first official live record of the bands career

“What you get is basically a Fishbone “best of,” set on a concert stage in Bordeaux, France. Name a Fishbone classic, and more times than not, it’s included in this release” – AllMusic.com
